description: Hot August Nights race lap.  HAN is a very large mountain biking race and event / gathering.  It's a 24 hour race, with other variations, in the rolling terrain, technical challenges abound.  A weekend rider will find lots of trails and riding opportunities.
directions: Albion Hills conservation area.  See the google map and / or GPS data attached.  Or just google Hot August Nites mountain bike race.
title: HAN 2011 Hot August Nights Albion Hills
